printed_text: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, you may install 1 program from your heap, ignoring all costs.
stripped_printed_text: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, you may install 1 program from your heap, ignoring all costs.

printed_text:
Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
X is equal to the number of hosted virus counters.
When your turn begins, you may pay 1[credit] to place 1 virus counter on this program.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 subroutine. X is equal to the number of hosted virus counters. When your turn begins, you may pay 1 credit to place 1 virus counter on this program.

flavor: A two-way solution to a one-way problem, the data leak reversal, or DLR for short, is a misnomer. There is no actual reversal of data, only the creation of a parallel peer-to-peer link with the initial source.
printed_text:
Install only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn.
If you are tagged, Data Leak Reversal gains "[click]: The Corp trashes the top card of R&D."
stripped_printed_text: Install only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn. If you are tagged, Data Leak Reversal gains "click: The Corp trashes the top card of R&D."

printed_text: Interface → 0[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, trash this program.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 0 credits: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, trash this program.

flavor:
"We're always happy to help, Mr. Santiago."
"I appreciate it, Mr. Li."
"We'll be in touch. And, Gabriel…"
"Yes?"
"Don't leave town."
printed_text: [click]: Draw 2 cards. When you do, add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack.
stripped_printed_text: click: Draw 2 cards. When you do, add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack.

flavor: A little corporate restructuring is necessary once in a while.
printed_text: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
stripped_printed_text: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.

flavor: Works best at your own desk.
printed_text: Whenever you breach R&D, access 1 additional card.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you breach R&D, access 1 additional card.

printed_text:
Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on Deep Thought.
If there are at least 3 virus counters on Deep Thought, it gains "When your turn begins, you may look at the top card of R&D."
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on Deep Thought. If there are at least 3 virus counters on Deep Thought, it gains "When your turn begins, you may look at the top card of R&D."

flavor: "New Angeles is the jewel of modern civilization, and its government the envy of nations." -Mayor Wells
printed_text:
2[credit]: Avoid 1 tag.
Trash New Angeles City Hall when you steal an agenda.
stripped_printed_text: 2 credits: Avoid 1 tag. Trash New Angeles City Hall when you steal an agenda.

flavor: "That's against the rules. The Creators will be angry."
printed_text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: Known for luxury hoppers and a delectable sauerkraut.
printed_text: As an additional cost to make a run on this server, the Runner must spend [click]. Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to make a run on this server, the Runner must spend click. Limit 1 region per server.

printed_text:
You can advance this asset.
[click], [trash]: Do 3 net damage. Use this ability only if there are 4 or more hosted advancement counters.
stripped_printed_text: You can advance this asset. click, trash: Do 3 net damage. Use this ability only if there are 4 or more hosted advancement counters.

printed_text: Whenever the Runner approaches a piece of ice protecting this server, you may swap that ice with 1 piece of ice from HQ. (The new ice is installed unrezzed.) If you do, the Runner may jack out. Use this ability only once per run.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner approaches a piece of ice protecting this server, you may swap that ice with 1 piece of ice from HQ. (The new ice is installed unrezzed.) If you do, the Runner may jack out. Use this ability only once per run.

flavor: *Some restrictions may apply. Scan this card to find out more.
printed_text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
stripped_printed_text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.

printed_text:
When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 hosted advancement counters past 3.
This agenda is worth 1 more agenda point for each hosted agenda counter.
stripped_printed_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 hosted advancement counters past 3. This agenda is worth 1 more agenda point for each hosted agenda counter.

printed_text:
Play only if the Runner stole an agenda during his or her last turn.
<trace>Trace 6</trace> If successful, give the Runner tags equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded his or her link strength.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if the Runner stole an agenda during his or her last turn. Trace 6 If successful, give the Runner tags equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded his or her link strength.

flavor: A bright light blossomed, and then the console went dark. That's when she smelled smoke.
printed_text: [subroutine]<trace>Trace 6</trace> If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware, do 2 meat damage (cannot be prevented), and end the run.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Trace 6 If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware, do 2 meat damage (cannot be prevented), and end the run.

flavor: They don't call them dedicated for nothing.
printed_text: If the Runner is tagged, Dedicated Response Team gains "Whenever a successful run ends, do 2 meat damage."
stripped_printed_text: If the Runner is tagged, Dedicated Response Team gains "Whenever a successful run ends, do 2 meat damage."

flavor: "If I had to describe the bugs in one word, it would be '****ing annoying.'" -Whizzard
printed_text: [subroutine] <trace>Trace 0</trace> If successful, the Runner trashes 1 program.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Trace 0 If successful, the Runner trashes 1 program.

flavor: There were several ways to win a corporate war. One of them was to bring out the bazookas.
printed_text: If you have at least 7[credit] when you score Corporate War, gain 7[credit]; otherwise, lose all credits in your credit pool.
stripped_printed_text: If you have at least 7 credits when you score Corporate War, gain 7 credits; otherwise, lose all credits in your credit pool.
